login.title: Sign In
login.subtitle: Enter your credentials to access your account

register.title: Create Account
register.subtitle: Enter your details to create a new account
register.name: Full Name

invite.title: Accept Invitation
invite.subtitle: You've been invited to join {{organization}}
invite.setPassword: Set your password to complete registration
invite.alreadyAccepted: This invitation has already been accepted
invite.permissions: You will receive the following permissions:

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email address and we'll send you a reset code
forgotPassword.sentMessage: Check your email for the password reset code
forgotPassword.codeDescription: Enter the code we sent to your email address

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.subtitle: Enter your new password
resetPassword.successMessage: You can now sign in with your new password

logout.title: Sign Out
logout.message: Are you sure you want to sign out?

session.expiringMessage: Your session will expire in {{minutes}} minutes. Would you like to stay signed in?
session.expiredMessage: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.

mfa.title: Two-Factor Authentication
mfa.subtitle: Enter the code from your authenticator app

deviceApproval.title: Device Verification Required
deviceApproval.description: We detected unusual activity on your account
deviceApproval.codeHint: Check your email for the verification code
deviceApproval.denied: Device denied. We recommend changing your password.
deviceApproval.expired: Verification expired. Please try logging in again.
deviceApproval.maxAttempts: Too many failed attempts. Please try logging in again.

linkApproval.title: Device Approval
linkApproval.success: Device approved! You can now login.
linkApproval.error: Could not approve device. The link may have expired.

trustedDevices.title: Trusted Devices
trustedDevices.description: Devices that can access your account without additional verification.
trustedDevices.removeOtherConfirm: Remove all other trusted devices? You'll need to verify again when logging in from those devices.
trustedDevices.removeConfirm: Remove this device from your trusted devices?

passkeys.title: Passkeys
passkeys.description: Sign in with your fingerprint, face, or security key

empty.title: No passkeys yet
empty.description: Passkeys let you sign in securely without a password

register.title: Add a Passkey
register.description: Your device will prompt you to verify your identity

delete.title: Delete Passkey
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this passkey? You won't be able to use it to sign in anymore.

login.error: Failed to sign in with passkey

notSupported.title: Passkeys not supported
notSupported.description: Your browser doesn't support passkeys. Try using a modern browser like Chrome, Safari, or Edge.

passkeys.multiDeviceHint: Register passkeys on multiple devices for backup access

devices.title: Devices
devices.description: Manage your logged-in devices. Revoke access to devices you no longer use.

empty.title: No devices
empty.description: You don't have any devices yet.

rename.title: Rename Device
rename.description: Give this device a custom name for easier identification.
rename.label: Device Name

revoke.title: Revoke Device
revoke.description: This will log out the device and remove its trusted status. The user will need to verify this device again on next login.
revoke.cannotRevokeCurrent: You cannot revoke your current device

approve.title: Approve Device
approve.description: Approve this pending device to allow it to complete login.

captcha.loadError: Failed to load security verification. Please refresh the page.

magicLink.title: Sign In with Magic Link
magicLink.sentMessage: We've sent a magic link to {{email}}. Click the link in the email to sign in.
magicLink.checkEmail: Check your email for the magic link
magicLink.validatingMessage: Please wait while we verify your magic link
magicLink.invalidToken: This magic link is invalid or has already been used
magicLink.retryOptions: You can try again with the following options:
